txt.en: The cabbage stall is nearly out of cabbages! The Cottons' Farm is the main supplier for the Farmers Faire, so it is time to make a trip to restock.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the event it is associated with ends. </rgb>

'Mercy me! I wasn't paying attention to the cabbages, but this supply went faster than I expected! Now we are almost out -- get to the Cottons' Farm to find another basket for the market and bring it back as quickly as you can.\n\n'Here...take this pie. It uses my great grand-mother's secret recipe, and it is said to lend you incredible speed when you take a bite of it. Hurry now. Do not tarry!'
The Cottons' Farm is in Bywater, not far at all from the Farmers Faire.\n\nYou should hurry to Tolman Cotton's farm and return with a basket of cabbages before the time runs out.
'Hurray, [placeholder]! You are the hero of the Farmers Faire!'

Sperling Took, the supplier of the Farmers Faire, can be found in Bywater.\n\nYou should return to Bywater as quickly as you can, taking bites of the pie to help you along if you find yourself needing a burst of energy.
'Hurry, [placeholder]! This is not the time to dilly-dally so!'
Collect the basket of cabbages (eat pie for a burst of energy)
Carry the basket of cabbages to the Farmers Market
